thread.title: Here's why Shahid Kapoor is thankful to choreographer Geeta Kapur
thread.title_full: Here's why Shahid Kapoor is thankful to choreographer Geeta Kapur - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Here's why Shahid Kapoor is thankful to choreographer Geeta Kapur
text:
Actor Shahid Kapoor, who started his career in showbiz as a background dancer, has thanked choreographer Geeta Kapur for teaching him the first dance steps of his dancing career.
The actor, who is gearing up to dazzle on the silver screen with the much-anticipated movie “Shaandaar" opposite Alia Bhatt , got nostalgic during ... »
